title: Airbnb: Vacation Rentals, Cabins, Beach Houses, Unique Homes & Experiences
1 Bed Studio with KLCC View/Rooftop Pool - Netflix
description: Close to Kuala Lumpur heartbeat and the majestic KLCC Petronas Twin Tower, Shopping Paradise of Bukit Bintang and food and entertainment outlets in the Golden Triangle. All rooms are overlooking the majestic KLCC Twin Towers and the Titiwangsa lake. We offer hot water shower, AC and a well furnished clean room. The infinity pool overlooking the stunning view of KLCC and KL Tower and Kuala Lumpur panoramic view. As a safety percaution, all areas in the room are pre-disinfected before checking in.The spaceA amazing suite with a view, enjoy a full panoramic view of the KLCC Twin Towers and the KL skyline. Day or Night. Stylish decorated with a small private seated area to enjoy a good cup of coffee or tea.Guest accessThere are 2 Infinity pools here, located on Level 48 and Level 8.Level 48 is the rooftop infinity pool and gym. There's a small entry fees of USD 4 per person for the pool and gym usage. Children under 12 years old are not allowed. Proper swimwear is needed.Level 8 is the Garden view infinity pool and kids pool The pool entry fee is free of charge.Both Level 48 infinity pool, Gym and Level 8 infinity pool opening hours are 8am till 10pm.Other things to noteA great new place and a breath taking KLCC Twin Towers view and a stunning 360-degree KL view.Places of Interest1) KLCC Petronas Twin Towers - 3 Km2) Bukit Bintang - 4 Km3) Pavillion, Lot 10, Berjaya Times Square - 4 Km4) Night Market Jalan Alor - 4 Km5) Restaurants and Night Bars at Changkat Bukit Bintang - 4 Km6) Dataran Merdeka (Independence Square) - 7 Km7) Sultan Abdul Samad Building - 7 Km8) China Town - 7 Km9) Central Market - 8 Km10) KL Tower - 7 Km11) Botanical Garden - 8 Km12) Birds Park - 8 Km13) Batu Caves - 12 Km14) Theon Hou Temple - 15 Km15) Terminal Bus Station - 20 Km15) Putrajaya - 30 Km16) Genting Highland and Premium Outlet - 35 Km17) KLIA 1 & KLIA 2 Airport - 60 Km

title: Ceylonz Suites 33A (A) high floor City View
Old Town - Wat Pho, Grand Palace
description: 218 located in Old Town Bangkok, surrounded Thai historical spots ; short walk to Grand Palace, Wat Pho and many attractionsOld commercial building is newly renovated The cozy private room on 3rd floor (no elevator) with king sized bed and en-suited bathroom1st Floor common area :-living room with pantry equipped with TV, wifi , air-conditioner, sofa, armchair, table, microwave, kettle,toaster and fridge.(kitchenware is not suitable for serious cooking as home cook)The spaceThe room will be one private room with en-suite bathroom on 3rd floor, very comfortable mattress ton ensure your good sleep , small sitting areaDuring your stayMy co-host live nearby and will be accessible to help with whatever you need

a place where one can rest quietly Yeonnam-dong, a quiet resting place
description: For those who want to travel quietly and cheaply alone, it's the perfect house. Although it's close to downtown Seoul, the accommodation is located in a quiet residential area, so you can relax quietly. It's very clean because it always cleans and manages.The spaceThe quiet house at the end of the Gyeongui Line Forest Road is the perfect house for those who want to spend the entire house alone.My house is a quiet accommodation close to Yeontral Park. You can feel the hot Yeonnam-dong with a little steps, while the accommodation is a small house where you can quietly relax after a bit of the hustle and bustle of the commercial area. There is a separate bedroom and quiet, so you can have a pleasant night's sleep.Our house is a quiet lodging house near Yeonnam-dong Park, Hongdae, Mangwon, and Han River. There are a famous restaurant and Yeontral park if you walk a little bit. But around the house is quiet.
